Police Department
=================

Our Mission
-----------

The mission of the Fairfield Police Department is to, in cooperation with the citizens of Fairfield, maintain public order and continually strive to improve the quality of life through fair and impartial public service and law enforcement.

Follow us on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100092596111665) to keep up with all the latest Police Department news & updates.
